DOC.brief_summary: A study ass possible drug-drug interaction MDV3100 gemfibrozil MDV3100 Itraconazole .
DOC.brief_title: Drug-drug Interaction Study With MDV3100 ( ASP9785 ) Gemfibrozil Itraconazole
DOC.criteria: Body weight least 65.0 kg great 85.0 kg . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) least 18.5 great 30.0 kg/m2 . Known suspected hypersensitivity MDV3100 , itraconazole , gemfibrozil , component formulation use , history liver toxicity drug . Confirmed CYP2C8 PM status base genotyping analysis . Any liver function test upper limit normal . A retest confirm result may perform . History seizure , include febrile seizure , loss consciousness , transient ischemia attack within 12 month prior enrollment ( Day 1 visit ) , condition may predispose seizure ( e.g. , prior stroke , brain arteriovenous malformation , head trauma loss consciousness require hospitalization ) . Any clinically significant history asthma , eczema , allergic condition previous severe hypersensitivity drug ( exclude nonactive hay fever ) . Abnormal pulse and/or blood pressure ( BP ) measurement prestudy visit follow : Pulse < 40 > 90 bpm ; mean systolic BP > 140 mmHg ; mean diastolic BP > 90 mmHg ( BP measurement take triplicate subject rest supine position 5 min ; pulse measure automatically ) . A QTc interval > 430 m repeat measurement ( consistently duplicate measurement ) , history unexplained syncope , cardiac arrest , unexplained cardiac arrhythmia torsades de pointes , structural heart disease , family history Long QT Syndrome ( LQTS ) . Regular use inducer metabolism ( e.g . barbiturate , rifampin ) 3 month prior admission Clinical Unit . Positive serology test HBsAg , anti HAV ( IgM ) , antiHCV antiHIV 1+2 .
